channel.title: Guys i really need HELP PLEASE!
channel.description: I have a huge problem with my downloads... i start downloading something and then half way or not even the download freezes up and i cant do anything about it. i keep redownloading the same thing happens the downloads keep freezing up. Can someone help me please. This happens in IE, FIREFOX, AND OPERA. PLEASE HELP

item.title: Guys i really need HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Something is probably wrong with your PC, Maybe a virus? Run a scan… And get a download manager

Read full topic
